fields.name: year
fields.title: Year
fields.description: This field must be populated with the four-digit calendar year that the request was closed.

fields.name: month
fields.title: Month (1-12)
fields.description: This field must be populated with a numerical representation of the month during which the request was closed.

fields.name: request_number
fields.title: Request Number
fields.description: Your institution’s request file number of the completed Access to Information request.

fields.name: summary_en
fields.title: English Summary
fields.description: A descriptive summary of the completed Access to Information request in English.

fields.name: summary_fr
fields.title: French Summary
fields.description: A descriptive summary of the completed Access to Information request in French.

fields.name: disposition
fields.title: Disposition
fields.description: The response disposition of the completed Access to Information request

fields.name: pages
fields.title: Number of Pages
fields.description: The number of pages released in response to the completed Access to Information request. If no records were released, enter a value of “0”.

fields.name: comments_en
fields.title: Comments English
fields.description: This field may be populated with additional or contextual comments in English.

fields.name: comments_fr
fields.title: Comments French
fields.description: This field may be populated with additional or contextual comments in French.
